projects.name: Stock Performance
projects.description: Web application to check out performance by company
projects.descriptionPopup: Stock performance is a web application to check out performance by company to see which one performs the best, based on an external API provided by Financial Modeling Prep.

projects.name: Buget App
projects.description: Mobile web application where you can manage your budget
projects.descriptionPopup: Budget app is a mobile web application where you can manage your budget: you have a list of transactions associated with a category, so that you can see how much money you spent and on what.

projects.name: Taste Food
projects.description: Web app to record the different user interactions with recipes (likes, comments).
projects.descriptionPopup: The Taste food web app is our JavaScript capstone project. Taste food is a web application based on an external food API, showing data about Italian foods and we used Used involvement API to record the different user interactions (likes, comments).
